main event: On November 3, 1948, an Air Force pilot reported sighting 8 objects identified as a cluster of balloons.
interesting points: The objects were spotted at an altitude of 13,000 feet and maneuvered with optical observation methods,The original report identified the objects as unidentified before establishing their true identity as balloons,Two Mustang fighters were dispatched to investigate the sighting,The craft was described as resembling an inflated intestine, and was estimated to be moving at about 2 mph.
witness description: Air Force pilots and a Coast Guard pilot
